titleInfo.title: Council of Jewish Junior Dress Up Party

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Dress up party of Junior Council about 1925, courtesy of Mrs. Wm. Stein., Zelma Perlou, #433, Caption (A lighter moment in Council activities, Dress up Party of Junior Council circa 1925, (photograph courtesy of Mrs. William Stein).'' Sticker on back of photograph: ''First Page, Council of Jewish Women.'' Handwritten on front of photograph: ''Grant Studio 1542 Glenarm.''

mods.abstract: A large group of young women, members of the Council of Jewish Juniors, at a dress up party. Some of the women are dressed as men.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
